comment.author: 43854658@N00
comment._content: Major General Thomas Henry Barry, (October 13, 1855 - December 30, 1919). Born in New York City, graduated West Point, 1877. Served in the Indian wars, The Spanish-American War, the Cuban occupation, and Philippines troubles. Appointed Superintendent of the Military Academy 1910-1912. --Excerpted New York Times The USAT Thomas H. Barry was named for General Thomas H. Barry. Acquired by the Army in June, 1941, it served until 1952. --Wikipedia Also see: "Togo at West Point with Gen. Barry (LOC)" by Library Of Congress and "Gen. Thos. Barry, in uniform"
